amendment.description: To prohibit the establishment of a program that allows Mexican truck drivers to operate beyond the commercial zones near the Mexican border.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2797 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 75 - 23. Record Vote Number: 331.

action.text: Amendment SA 2797 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11305-11312; text: CR S11305) To prohibit the establishment of a program that allows Mexican truck drivers to operate beyond the commercial zones near the Mexican border.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2797 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 75 - 23. Record Vote Number: 331.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2797 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 75 - 23. Record Vote Number: 331.
